Jaydyn Barnett, 22, dies suddenly in Middlemore Hospital, family lays complaint https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/29-year-old-dies-suddenly-in-middlemore-hospital-family-lays-complaint/ZGAYT34WCNGPFMHMBZW3DPHGHI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/29-year-old-dies-suddenly-in-middlemore-hospital-family-lays-complaint/ZGAYT34WCNGPFMHMBZW3DPHGHI/ Isaac DavisonThe family claimed Jaydyn Barnett was ready to go home but died suddenly after a fall. Fri, 03 May 2024 21:39:35 +0000 Jaydyn Barnett, 29, was airlifted to Middlemore Hospital after falling off a horse in Maketū, Bay of Plenty. He died suddenly while recovering at the hospital and his family has laid a complaint about his care.
